sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A neweyeres gift to the rebellious persons in the north partes of England Primo Ianuar. 1570. Seene and alowed, accordyng to the order appoynted. Elviden, Edmund, poet.
[20] p.
In Powles Churchyarde at the signe of Loue and Death, by Richarde VVatkyns, [Imprinted at London : [1570]]
In verse. Printer's name and address from colophon. Signatures: A-B⁴ C² . Running title reads: A neweyeres gift to the rebelles. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

In verse. Printer's name and address from colophon. Signatures: A-B⁴ C² . Running title reads: A neweyeres gift to the rebelles. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

the signe of Loue
